body.p: John Douly was fined in the Police Court of Harrodsburg 83 1/2 cents & another fine of $5,00 in Same Court both for getting Intoxicated the Debts have been replieved J P Doyle & Jno Burke Seely
You told me when I saw you that you would remit the fines
You will find his Petition on file doubtless Please send the remittance included to me

Very Respectfully
Yours Ben C Allen

Remitted as to Five Dollar fine --
B. M
